meanings.definition: A form of incentive offered by credit card companies where a percentage of the amount spent is returned to the cardholder in the form of cash.
meanings.sent1: After using my credit card, I received some cashback as a reward.
meanings.sent2: I love getting cashback when I use my credit card for purchases.
meanings.sent3: Getting cashback feels like a little surprise gift from the credit card company.
meanings.sent4: Receiving cashback is like getting a small bonus for using my credit card.
meanings.sent5: The cashback I earned made me feel like a smart shopper.

meanings.definition: The act of receiving money back after making a purchase.
meanings.sent1: I always look forward to getting cashback after buying something.
meanings.sent2: Getting cashback is like a little refund for my purchase.
meanings.sent3: It's like a mini celebration every time I receive cashback after shopping.
meanings.sent4: Receiving cashback is a pleasant surprise after spending money.
meanings.sent5: The cashback I got made me feel like I saved money on my purchase.
